meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kelvin Smith Monica Ashar Jenny Wrigley Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7624.

td.p: Kelvin Smith, a PhD student from Birmingham, Alabama
Monica Ashar, an attorney from Washington, D.C.
Jenny Wrigley, a yoga instructor from Olive Branch, Mississippi (whose 1-day cash winnings total $22,401)

tr.td: LET'S EXPLORE
HERBS
LITERATURE FOR THE YOUNG
THE "RIGHT" STUFF
HEAVENLY BODIES
ENTERTAINMENT TONIGHT TRAVELS THROUGH TIME
(Kevin Frazier: Some of history's biggest stories.) (Nancy O'Dell: ET style.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'An Explorers Club member, this 2nd man to stand on the moon lent his name to a space exploration award given by the club')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: An Explorers Club member, this 2nd man to stand on the moon lent his name to a space exploration award given by the club

div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_J_6_1', 'clue_J_6_1_stuck', '(Nancy O\'Dell and Kevin Frazier of Entertainment Tonight present the clue.)
(Kevin) Studio execs are scratching their heads as this sleeper sci-fi movie is overshadowing "The Other Side of Midnight" as the summer hit of 1977
(Nancy) It opened at Mann\'s Chinese Theater just before Memorial Day weekend & it\'s looking like a blockbuster')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td:
(Nancy O'Dell and Kevin Frazier of Entertainment Tonight present the clue.)
(Kevin) Studio execs are scratching their heads as this sleeper sci-fi movie is overshadowing "The Other Side of Midnight" as the summer hit of 1977
(Nancy) It opened at Mann's Chinese Theater just before Memorial Day weekend & it's looking like a blockbuster

Star Trek, the Enterprise

')

div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_J_6_3', 'clue_J_6_3_stuck', '(Nancy O\'Dell and Kevin Frazier of Entertainment Tonight present the clue.)
(Kevin) It\'s November 21, 1980, with an actors\' strike pushing the TV season back, it\'s been 8 months since we saw this character get shot
(Nancy) Tonight, 80 million viewers around the country will finally find out who done it--
(Kevin) My money\'s on the sister-in-law')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td:
(Nancy O'Dell and Kevin Frazier of Entertainment Tonight present the clue.)
(Kevin) It's November 21, 1980, with an actors' strike pushing the TV season back, it's been 8 months since we saw this character get shot
(Nancy) Tonight, 80 million viewers around the country will finally find out who done it--
(Kevin) My money's on the sister-in-law

div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_J_6_5', 'clue_J_6_5_stuck', '(Nancy O\'Dell and Kevin Frazier of Entertainment Tonight present the clue.)
(Nancy) The March 19th, 1990 cover of Newsweek-- "Rap Rage!" Has rap gone too far?
(Kevin) With this "Funky Cold Medina" & "Wild Thing" rapper pictured below the headline, we\'ll say it--no. No, it hasn\'t')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td:
(Nancy O'Dell and Kevin Frazier of Entertainment Tonight present the clue.)
(Nancy) The March 19th, 1990 cover of Newsweek-- "Rap Rage!" Has rap gone too far?
(Kevin) With this "Funky Cold Medina" & "Wild Thing" rapper pictured below the headline, we'll say it--no. No, it hasn't

Monica
Kelvin

toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: John Tyler and Richard Nixon were two of the men, but they did not share the same last name.)

Johnson')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Only 4 men have been both VP & president & served in both houses of Congress; 2 of them shared this last name')

tr.td: U.S. HISTORY
Only 4 men have been both VP & president & served in both houses of Congress; 2 of them shared this last name
Jenny
Monica
Kelvin
2nd place: $2,000
New champion: $12,801
3rd place: $1,000
Jenny
Monica
Kelvin

20 R
(including 2 DDs),
3 W

17 R,
5 W
(including 1 DD)

5 R,
2 W

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
